name: Deluge Mecha Story
description:
The humanity is down! To fight back we need giant Mechas and much more TURN BASED COMBAT!

DELUGE MECHA STORY is a short and different JRPG made for GAME BOY JAM 8, with no Experience points and a different way to create a gameplay progression.

MANY DIFFERENT MECHAS

The game have 9 different Mechas with different abilities and params to play many times and have multiples strategies. TRY TO PLAY WITH ALL!

UPGRADE YOUR MILITARY RANK

You begin as a LIEUTENANT and can progress until become a MAJOR!

SO MANY DIFFERENT MISSIONS!

DELUGE MECHA STORY have three different types of mission: TEST, ASSAULT and SCOUT. The missions have different difficulties as well: EASY, NORMAL and HARD. Try to complete all and BEAT THE GAME!
